apihelp-getheaderfooter-description: Leɛ de a yelbulo  zu bee a baaroo a Pagyi kaŋa yelboɔraa
apihelp-getheaderfooter-summary: Leɛ de a yelbulo zu bee baaroo a pagyi kaŋa yelboɔra
apihelp-getheaderfooter-param-contexttit: A pagyi piiluu naŋ e a yelzu bee baaroo paale la.
apihelp-getheaderfooter-param-messageid: Yelzu bee baaroo boɔbo la (aseŋ: a yuori vuo yelzu)
apihelp-getheaderfooter-example-1: Bɔ a NS_MAIN baara ko a pagyi meŋɛ
